title: Print, "Plan du Projet de l'Autel de l'Eglise de St. Aignan d'Orleans en 1730 (Plan of Design for the Altar of the Church of St. Aignan of Orleans in 1730), plate 106, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J. A. Meissonnier in.; lower right: Huquier Sculp. et ex. rue St. Jacque. CPR.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper left: R; upper right: 106; lower left: Plan du Projet de / l'Autel de l'Eglise de St. Aignan dOrleans en 1730; lower right: Plan du Projet de la Chapelle de la Vierge / de St. Sulpice de Paris.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Plan of altar with stairs and scales.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plan du Projet de l'Autel de l'Eglise de St. Aignan d'Orleans en 1730 (Plan of Design for the Altar of the Church of St. Aignan of Orleans in 1730), plate 106, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748.
1748. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-212-64-a.
